channel.title: Replica or New Concept?
channel.description:
I'm curious as to what everyone wants. I constantly see people complain when servers have updates that only replicate RSC, and I see the same for unique content.
If it's another issue alltogether, then I'd like to know what it is.

item.title: Replica or New Concept?
item.dc:creator: @cyndibal cyndibal
item.description:
@cyndibal wrote:

lol alright buddy, just like i said you wont enter the wilderness until you have dream stats

nobody had 99 pray in rsc but we still did fine

Read full topic

item.title: Replica or New Concept?
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

so it’s a pain to get 99 prayer/range on 35xp so let’s knock it down to 2xp!
Many high level xp servers succeeded because they had a large community(kingpk,p2project,piruonline,peekay,castlewars,flamepk,swagpk,) plenty more
that I can’t remember at the moment. Did you just join the community?
I’m not gonna debate this anymore with ya since you won’t respond to half of what I say and lack logic when you answer the other half.
so in other words

Read full topic

item.title: Replica or New Concept?
item.dc:creator: @cyndibal cyndibal
item.description:
@cyndibal wrote:

[quote=“nacional, post:22, topic:416303”][quote author=cyndibal link=topic=518238.msg3766720#msg3766720 date=1317309809]

What I want :
Xp around 15-35 xp.
[/quote]Yep that’s pretty much right.

I don’t understand how you could be so be foolish. There is no way that rational logic is backing a decision to make exp rates 13-35. With those rates, it will give the “don’t enter the wilderness until I have dream stats” but it will still take at least a week to get flats, or make a hybrid for instance. If you didn’t catch the hint, everyone in the wilderness will be the same stats, having the same boring fights at castle we’ve all been having for 5+ years now. Except as opposed to a real PK server like stork, you just took a fucking week and a half to get your stats. And don’t you dare think that a server with those rates will have any sort of economy or gameplay besides PKing and staking.

It’s always been like that bro, even in rscangel. Most high level pure pkers had 99 str. Comparing a week to a week and half as the real way to set the stats what? Besides
most people don’t have the time to play at 2xp sorry we aren’t teenagers any more. Also if done right even on easy high xp servers had pking besides flats. Also the 15-35 rate
wasn’t bad, 15 was where rsce started and many people liked it, 30 was where kingpk was and most people liked it. 20ish was where p2ppk was and many liked it. This were
all servers that at one time had most of the community playing, so foolish to get a xp rate from that range for a pk server? I don’t think so.[/quote]

cbf responding to half the shit that you said because im no longer a teenager and don’t have time for such things, BUT

if it’s a PK server, that would make it an anti-grinding server right? Good luck getting 99 pray or ranged on a 15x or even 35x exp server without botting, buying mass dragon bone certs (which would mean someone else grinded them), or zezima’ing.

high exp rates (excluding PK servers with 100x+ exp rates, that shits fun to pk on) may be fun at first but they ruin the game, if you can’t see this I don’t know how to help you.

Read full topic

item.title: Replica or New Concept?
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

In order to add new content your going to need the right tools. Proper 3D landscape editors, Sprite Editors, Model Editors… etc and a Client that allows for ease of production. Not hard coding a damn screen.

Read full topic

item.title: Replica or New Concept?
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

Everything we pretty much enjoy or enjoyed about RSC has pretty much been replicated, If RSC was still around now and being monitored and updated, Im sure there would of been several new features and updates we would of liked to of seen added, So i think its always good to yes keep RSC replicated on how we last remembered it & Played it, But theres no harm in new features which will carry on making it interesting.

Theres only so long us old players will carry on playing for, The idea now to keep the community & Game alive is to keep adding new and original features, That will attract and interest new players. We have to rely on new players to keep the community growth high. This will obviously incourage old players to keep on playing as there will be a bigger player community. Theres no point in just concentrating on what old players want because that hasnt worked in the past as more and more quit due to lack of players.

If a server has more active players, And the Wilderness is constantly active. This encourages them to play. No one wants to be sat at the castle for hours on end waiting for 1 or 2 people to login.

PS: I’ve always said that RSCE needs a complete DB wipe, And the Rates lowered, I know a large percentage of the community disagrees with this, Because were all mature adults now, And we dont have time to train with such low XP Rates & Lack of time, But the reason why RSC was so enjoyable was there was always somthing to aim for, We were always aiming for those higher stats, And it was a struggle, And when we got a R2H Kill in the Wild, Or Full Set, It was exciting, Because 2H’s were Valuable, Sets were Valuable, I remember days when R2H were 750k-1M and when they hadnt introduced fast trade, So it was pretty much impossible to trade over 500-700k without logging out, You had to every so often hit the Space & Ent key to remain logged in a little longer.

The way to keep a server exciting & enjoyable is Slow XP & Good economy, Were only a handfull of people will reach smithing in the 90’s And most people will only likely have sets of Addy & Maybe a Rune Long at best.

I remember playing Demonik and that was pretty much like that for a fair while untill it shutdown, Getting a full Addy kill was great.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @cyndibal cyndibal
item.description:

What I want :
Xp around 15-35 xp.
[/quote]Yep that’s pretty much right.

I don’t understand… blah blah blah… with those rates will have any sort of economy or gameplay besides PKing and staking.
[/quote]I really don’t mind skills to be at 1x xp rate (im not a skiller anyway lol) but cb need some serious improvements. Its just not fun to do weeks afk training just for some decent stats and some quality pvp. That’s why i posted my own custom xp rate to deal with the boring cb training of rsc. Check it out!

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

if this idea was implemented on an otherwise 1-3x exp rate server the shit could be godly

item.title: Replica or New Concept?
item.dc:creator: @cyndibal cyndibal
item.description:
@cyndibal wrote:

[quote=“latifundio, post:17, topic:416303”][quote author=nacional link=topic=518238.msg3766516#msg3766516 date=1317267921]
What I want :
Xp around 15-35 xp.
[/quote]Yep that’s pretty much right.[/quote]

I don’t understand how you could be so be foolish. There is no way that rational logic is backing a decision to make exp rates 13-35. With those rates, it will give the “don’t enter the wilderness until I have dream stats” but it will still take at least a week to get flats, or make a hybrid for instance. If you didn’t catch the hint, everyone in the wilderness will be the same stats, having the same boring fights at castle we’ve all been having for 5+ years now. Except as opposed to a real PK server like stork, you just took a fucking week and a half to get your stats. And don’t you dare think that a server with those rates will have any sort of economy or gameplay besides PKing and staking.

Read full topic

item.title: Replica or New Concept?
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

[quote=“nacional, post:13, topic:416303”]What I want :
Xp around 15-35 xp.
F2p.
1 player capabilities. Whether that’s quest, minigames, fetch clues,boss,slayer, so in other word new concepts.
Imo the failure of the pk servers, is that it’s impossible to keep many people online at a time to where they
are able to pk. Most solution people put in for this, is more grind to leveling and harder to get items. Which no one wants to really or when they do reach that they won’t stay online to wait for others to pk.[/quote]Yep that’s pretty much right.

Read full topic

item.title: Replica or New Concept?
item.dc:creator: @JUMPHIM JUMPHIM
item.description:
@JUMPHIM wrote:

[quote=“latifundio, post:3, topic:416303”]Well the game is 10 years old and it is easy to get tired of the same landscape, same quests and same of everything.

I think the aftermath concept was pretty good, leaving the wildy untouched and having a new mainland with new towns and stuff, maybe a bit smaller and more detalied (forests, dungeons, buildings) would have been better.

Having some new quest to access the new areas add more to the exploration feeling (the quest could just be variants of the current ones) and that is always good.

So in the end if the new content is good is better for the player, otherwise then a replica with some more features. ;)[/quote]
iam with this guy when i get on real rsc now i want to rage quit, what the hell was i doing ten years ago wasted my life and still am:(

Read full topic

item.title: Replica or New Concept?
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

[quote=“Vicd, post:7, topic:416303”]It should not be impossible to create enough close replica.
The biggest mistakes what people does are:

  • High xp rate (5x+ is high, good stats are meant to be hard to get)
  • F2P or P2P only. (People wants try out both, without cutting the player base(events!))
  • No quests
  • ^ Items like rune plate and dragon sword should require the quests to be completed
  • High drop rate on the best items on the game. (Rune/dragon/bloods)
  • Overpowered custom armors/weapons
  • WAY too much cash ingame on every server
  • No flame/spam controll[/quote]You forgot those tele-pools all over the place, master fisher, rats in castle and those annoying server messages each 5 mins telling how important is to buy subs.

@codeforfame Hey are you doing the poll for what content yo will add to your rsc-base? If so host it man, i would love to play.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Vicd Vicd
item.description:
@Vicd wrote:

It should not be impossible to create enough close replica.
The biggest mistakes what people does are:

  • High xp rate (5x+ is high, good stats are meant to be hard to get)
  • F2P or P2P only. (People wants try out both, without cutting the player base(events!))
  • No quests
  • ^ Items like rune plate and dragon sword should require the quests to be completed
  • High drop rate on the best items on the game. (Rune/dragon/bloods)
  • Overpowered custom armors/weapons
  • WAY too much cash ingame on every server
  • No flame/spam controll

item.title: Replica or New Concept?
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

Well the game is 10 years old and it is easy to get tired of the same landscape, same quests and same of everything.

I think the aftermath concept was pretty good, leaving the wildy untouched and having a new mainland with new towns and stuff, maybe a bit smaller and more detalied (forests, dungeons, buildings) would have been better.

Having some new quest to access the new areas add more to the exploration feeling (the quest could just be variants of the current ones) and that is always good.

So in the end if the new content is good is better for the player, otherwise then a replica with some more features.

Read full topic
